title: How to shred or dispose papers with Quranic Verses (ayat)? | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: uh jamilah says i have shredded some paper and some has quran is it to bend this or must i burn it well if the shredding was neat where you cannot recognize the name of allah or a verse of the quran so it was shredded perfectly that the words are not recognizable you don't need to burn it you can throw it in the dustbin
